resources.string: You have %1$d connectable devices in this room

This is our Smart Home App! 

 You can connect wirelessly to 
 all your compatible home devices! 

 Use the Menu Bar to select which Room you 
 would like. Home, Living, Kitchen or Garage.

From the Living Room press Add to name 
 your new device as well as select what 
 type of functionality it will have by 
 Scrolling through the options. 

 Selecting your device will allow you 
to change the various settings. 

 Our Smart System memorizes 
 your last known settings! 
 Upgrading to a new Lamp? 
 Remove an old entry at any time. 

 When you are done Press Back to 
 return to your list of devices. 

 by Chris Billings Version:1.0
